page.title: 02MY FATHER IS THE VICAR
page.content: My name is Rachel.My father is the vicar of the parish of St Philip and St James .The Parish is around the harbour area of Ilfracombe.The church was built in 1863.My family live in the vicarage.You can still see the front door that was used by important visitors and the side door that was used by the tradesmen and poor people. My dad prepares his services on Friday ready for Sunday.He visits the sick people and sometimes takes Communion. He arranges baptisms and marriages and funerals.He has a Parish on Lundy Island which he visits once a month, travelling on the Lundy supply ship the Polar Bear.My mum takes a group of teenagers called Pathfinders on Sunday mornings.They sing songs and study the Bible.Sometimes it is exciting being a vicar's daughter.
